com.modthemod.api.base
Class Base

java.lang.Object
  com.modthemod.api.property.Matcher
      com.modthemod.api.property.Type<Entity>
          com.modthemod.api.base.Base
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public final class Base
extends Type<Entity>
implements Serializable, Cloneable

Represents a base of an Entity.

Bases are immutable. The only thing that is "changed" with bases are the event listeners, which can be added or removed at will.

See Also:
Serialized Form

toString

public String toString()
Description copied from class: Type
Gets a String representation of this Type.

This representation, when plugged back into Type.valueOf(java.lang.String), must return this Type once again. This should fit the regex of /a-z/g unless it is a special type.
